sentences.sentence: He just finished his Ph.D. in Copenhagen, and he had won himself a postdoctoral fellowship, courtesy of the Carlsberg Brewery foundation.
sentences.translation: 他刚刚在哥本哈根取得博士学位，取得了由嘉士伯基金资助的博士后奖金。

sentences.sentence: Our brewery products 1200-1500 hectoliters per year.
sentences.translation: 我们的啤酒厂每年生产1200-1500百升啤酒。

sentences.sentence: Another goal is to make the bugs quicker at breaking down the brewery waste.
sentences.translation: 另一个目的就是能够让这些菌类更快地分解酿酒残渣。
